title: Independent Samples T-test — independentSamplesTTest

title: Independent Samples T-test — independentSamplesTTest
code: independentSamplesTTest(data = sleep, dependent = "extra", groupBy = "group") #> $ttest #>   dependent         t       df          p #> 1     extra -1.860813 17.77647 0.07939414 #>
